author: cnbc.com
title: FOR MEDIA ONLY: Boeing to Hold First-Quarter Earnings Call on April 25
text:
Boeing (NYSE: BA) will release its financial results for the first quarter of 2018 on Wednesday, April 25.
At 10:30 a.m. ET, Chairman, President and Chief Executive Officer Dennis Muilenburg and Chief Financial Officer and Executive Vice President of Enterprise Performance & Strategy Greg Smith will discuss the results during a conference call that will be webcast.
Media within the U.S. should dial 1-800-230-1093 to participate in the call. Media outside the U.S. should dial 612-332-0107. The passcode for both is "Boeing."
The event will be webcast at http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1625756/E99670045E13D540761945710F3EDCEE .
A Boeing news release and presentation materials will be posted to the Investors section of www.boeing.com prior to the event.
An audio replay will be available approximately one hour after the call ends by dialing 1-800-475-6701 within the U.S. or 320-365-3844 from outside. The passcode for both is 446409. The replay will remain available for one week.
CONTACT: Boeing Corporate Communications (312) 544-2002
Follow us on Twitter: @Boeing
/PRNewswire -- March 28, 2018/
SOURCE Boeing
